Support

Category: Ownership

I'm missing some of my purchased issues

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

  1. Open the App menu
  2. Tap ‘Manage Account’
  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

Already tried this?

If you've tried this but you still require assistance, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request
  • Leave app feedback
  • Privacy policy
